title: Best of The Program | Guest: Target Tori | 8/13/20
description:
The woke movement is teaching Americans to be racist. The New York Times’ “Nice White Parents” podcast would be obviously racist if the races were reversed. Three doctors told USA Today that making a coronavirus vaccine mandatory and punishing those who don’t take it is our “patriotic duty." The federal government wants to shut down the economy again, but the numbers don’t support it. Stu lists the five things you need to know about Kamala Harris. Target Tori, who went viral after a customer tried to shame her online, joins to discuss her “Pause. Be Kind” movement and a campaign to help another worker shamed online, Kroger Andy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
